last_episode_to_air.name: Team LopeZpinosa
last_episode_to_air.overview: Tina and Silvia face off in a political duel to become the neighborhood's representative, until an unexpected candidate shifts their campaign strategies.

name: The War Next-door
overview: When two antagonistic families end up living next door in a posh neighborhood, the matriarchs ensue a full-scale war of unintended consequences.

episodes.name: The Rich Cry Too
episodes.overview: As the López family settles into their new home, their neighbor Silvia is shocked to learn they are having a party the same day she's hosting an event.

episodes.name: Axi-NacaR
episodes.overview: Leonor comes up with an idea to pay the mansion's pile of bills and blackmails Silvia into helping her. Tere aids Crista in a risky situation.

episodes.name: Muchach-app
episodes.overview: When Diego partners up with Leonor for business, Silvia tries to thwart their plans. Pablo fakes being a driving instructor to get close to Crista.

episodes.name: Game On
episodes.overview: Cata starts working in the López household, but Sylvia wants her back. Ernesto asks Genaro's help to win his office's football tournament.

episodes.name: Nothing to See Here!
episodes.overview: When Silvia accuses the López family of painting graffiti on her wall, Leonor sets out to uncover the real culprit. Genaro has his first day at work.

episodes.name: The Cold War
episodes.overview: A resentful Crista decides to move in with the López gang. After agreeing on a peace treaty, both families struggle to keep their end of the bargain.

episodes.name: Rappi-dín
episodes.overview: A tantric yoga class fuels Silvia and Leonor's relentless competition. Diego and Tere team up to create an app to sell sex toys.

episodes.name: Bellas Señoras
episodes.overview: The López family hesitates about selling the house when a mysterious sign appears on a wall, so Silvia kicks off one final scheme to force them to sell.

episodes.name: The Funeral
episodes.overview: After the Lópezes put their mansion up for sale and the Espinozas go bankrupt, both families end up living in the same modest neighborhood.

episodes.name: Sonidero Time
episodes.overview: Tina hosts a party, but the guests will show up only if Silvia, who is now a celebrity in the neighborhood, also attends. Ernesto asks Rigo for a job.

episodes.name: The Fellowship of the Ring
episodes.overview: When Silvia turns exercising into a trend, Tina retaliates by selling weight-loss shakes. Diego focuses on showing Tere he wants a serious relationship.

episodes.name: Signals
episodes.overview: To Silvia's dismay, the two families must go on a field trip together. Rigo asks Ernesto for dating advice. Crista is smitten with one of Pablo's friends.

episodes.name: Buen Fin vs. Thanksgiving
episodes.overview: Silvia faces the challenge of organizing a Thanksgiving dinner for her posh friends. Tomás asks Pablo for advice on how to get dumped.

episodes.name: Mr. Barrio
episodes.overview: Rigo organizes a contest to find the next "Mr. Barrio," a title previously held by Genaro. Diego tests out his new food app with Dolores' restaurant.

episodes.name: Three-Way
episodes.overview: Silvia and Ernesto decide to celebrate their anniversary at an exclusive restaurant, unaware that Rigo and Tina are having their first date there.

episodes.name: Team LopeZpinosa
episodes.overview: Tina and Silvia face off in a political duel to become the neighborhood's representative, until an unexpected candidate shifts their campaign strategies.
